entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
